title: Sword Art Online: Integral Factor - Prologue Comic
original_name: ソードアート・オンライン インテグラル・ファクター PROLOGUE COMIC
sinopse:
In 2022, a genius by the name of Akihiko Kayaba created the first FullDive VRMMORPG: Sword Art Online. However, this game has a terrifying secret: You can't log out until the game is beaten, and dying in game means death in real life... This is the story of a player trapped in this deadly game, dreaming of conquering Aincrad. Your story.

(Source: Bandai Namco Entertainment)
